buttons.RotateSphereToolUseMessage: Click and drag to rotate the sphere.
buttons.MoveObjectToolUseMessage: Click and drag an object to move it. Movable objects include labels, free points, and line segments with antipodal endpoings. Hold the SHIFT key to select from the back of the sphere.
buttons.CreatePointToolUseMessage: Click to insert a free point.
buttons.CreateLineToolUseMessage: Click and drag to insert a line defined by two points.
buttons.CreateLineSegmentToolUseMessage: Click and drag to insert line segment defined by two points.
buttons.CreateCircelToolUseMessage: Click and drag to insert a circle with a given center point and through a second point.
